lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. suspended Milwaukee forward Giannis Antetokounmpo for one game without pay for running into Chicago Bulls forward Mike Dunleavy..

headline.main: Giannis Antetokounmpo Barred for a Game

snippet: The N.B.A. suspended Milwaukee forward Giannis Antetokounmpo for one game without pay for running into Chicago Bulls forward Mike Dunleavy..
abstract: NBA suspends Milwaukee Bucks forward Giannis Antetokounmpo for one game without pay for deliberately running into Chicago Bulls forward Mike Dunleavy in Bucks season-ending, 120-66 playoff loss.
